android-cloexec-inotify-init1.description:
Description

inotify_init1()
should include
IN_CLOEXEC
in its type argument
to avoid the file descriptor leakage. Without this flag, an opened
sensitive file would remain open across a fork+exec to a
lower-privileged SELinux domain.

Examples:

inotify_init1
(
IN_NONBLOCK
);
// becomes
inotify_init1
(
IN_NONBLOCK
|
IN_CLOEXEC
);
android-cloexec-inotify-init1.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
